entry.tran: (特别仪式、正式宴会上的)主持人，致祝酒词者
entry.def: At a special ceremony or formal dinner, the toastmaster is the person who proposes toasts and introduces the speakers.

means.word_mean: 1. the person who proposes toasts and introduces speakers at a banquet
